task.summary: Created new twitter stream python file that uses postgresql instead of mongo
Encapsulated code in try catch to exit on error.
Added support for tweets longer than 140 characters. Added vaderSentiment library
Integrated sentiment analysis to tweet collection. Added modules for historic sentiment updating and lexicon generation. Tidied up modules to ensure good software development practices adherence.
Updated Database Manager to use new database schema. Area_id is now assigned when a tweet is added to the database
Sockets and server now work beautifully together

Added support for tweets longer than 140 characters. Added vaderSentiment library

Updated Database Manager to use new database schema. Area_id is now assigned when a tweet is added to the database
Sockets and server now work beautifully together
